title: Yony Calsin - Frontend Developer
description: I am a frontend developer creating open source projects and writing on modern JavaScript, Node.js, Typescript and Graphql.

about-me.title: About Me
about-me.description: Hi, I'm Yony Calsin, a frontend developer, passionate about web programming (frontend, backend), throughout my career I've had the chance to work on several projects that have given me the opportunity to execute my knowledge in these areas and also to keep learning about them.

contact.title: Contact
